author: Redzye
post_text: August 30, 2018 at 6:38 PM#1Hello guys,I am trying to change my effects via Macros.So far everything is working except when I try to change the phase of the effect to 0 thru 360..I can easily change it to a single number like 0, 90,180 but as soon as I try to add a 0 thru, it only accepts the 0.Command line :Assign $colorfx /phase=0 thru 180I also tried to put it in "" but that also didn't work.Even if I used the pop up window to manually type the phase it didn't work.I would appreciate any help.Thanks in advance.
title: Changing Effect Phase via Macro
